author: chris cheng
comment: I was pleasantly surprised by the ambient mode brightness adjustability!

author: Rohit Gurung
comment: My account got charged but when I tried to install the app, I was kept on getting an error, but after several attempts finally I was able to download and installed successfully. Watch face is amazingly beautiful. Thanx team...
title: Getting an error 925

author: Hugh Janus
comment: Please give the option for full colored ambient.

reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
If you have an additional question,please feel free to contact our email address.

author: Lennon Leikam
comment: Looks fantastic. I like that you can make it any color you want. The dimmed mode looks great too.
title: Awesome

author: Jennifer Guthrie
comment: This app said it loaded. I even tried reinstalling it and I can't find it to make changes to it. Fine if you want the default brown face.

title: Can't find it

author: Alex Barroso
comment: I wish all watch faces were as stable and clean as this one
title: Great and simple design

author: Robin Hebert
comment: My fav watch face now.
title: Its Amazing

author: jake judy
comment: Doesn't work after android wear update 5.1....loved this face before it stopped working, please fix! Will change rating upon correction

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
I've updated the app available for Android Wear 5.0 firmware.
Would you please check the update.Thank you.

author: James Cole
comment: Another update and still no way to disable dimmed mode... All the other faces by the developer have that feature, but not this one, ugh.
title: Disable dimmed / ambient mode

author: Evil Droid
comment: This is one of my favorite watch faces. It's very easy on the battery and I love the different colors you can change the background to. It makes it almost like a new face every time you change the color. Information is easy to read too. Would like to see a phone battery icon added to it also.
title: Great  one

author: Craig Barrett
comment: Love the face and the way it takes advantage of the 'flat tyre' on the Moto 360. Runs very smoothly and does not seem to chew the battery.
title: Great watch face

author: Milan Cosovic
comment: I prefer using it that way,  black background with white text.
title: Add seconds in black and white mode

author: william hampton
comment: Cool

author: Jody Newell
comment: I would give this app 5 stars if I had the ability to turn off black and white (dimmed) mode.  It's distracting that it quickly changes modes when I glance at the watch.  Otherwise excellent app.

author: dev acharya
comment: Installed in my Asus Zenfone 5 & it automatically synced with my Moto 360 Watch.... Looks amazing
title: Js love it

author: Badí Hernández
comment: Nice watchface and superb battery life.
title: Great!

author: Matthew Brownbill
comment: Nice watch face

author: Mark Sanders
comment: When in dimmed mode you lose the seconds counter.  I wished there was an option to always show seconds (for work).  Thanks for the wonderful watch face.
title: Only one thing missing from making it perfect.

author: Chandrakant Ezong
comment: Works now with the new update, thanks.

author: Donald Williams
comment: By far my favorite watch face so far.
title: The best

author: Long Van
comment: Much better after allowing to turn off black/white mode!

author: Chetan Prasad
comment: Love it thanks

comment: I just bought your F01 watchable and it comes with enable drawing for ambient mode setting. Can you enable this setting on this watchface.  Thanks

reply.content:

title: Beautiful Watchface

author: Shayne Daugherty
comment: I love this watch face.  The only thing I dislike is how the black-and-white mode displays first, and then switches to the regular face.  If there was an option to disable the black-and-white face so that the 'regular' face shows smoothly, I would definitely give this 5 stars.
title: My favorite watch face so far.

author: Sander Brand
comment: Awesome watch face. Could be better if we can set the regular watch face without having the black / white.

author: Chris Edwards
comment: Very responsive dev. Works hard updating. Love the watch face and the improvements

reply.content:

title: Thank you

author: William Stone
comment: The only thing missing for me is battery percentage, (NOT ANYMORE HE/SHE ADDED IT) Thank you could you add this please? I need reading glasses and was looking for a digital face that I could read without my glasses on and had the date and day also. You nailed it thank you! Honestly you can not go wrong with this developer, super awesome customer service. I will buy more from this developer without hesitation!

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
OK.I'm planning to add the 'Battery option'.
Thank you.

title: Love it, Super awesome developer responsiveness to issues and follow up!!!

author: Leon Stewart
comment: Some days you just want to foot in with all the other dumb watches... almost. This face has just a coolness factor that is of the charts, a must have watch face in your arsenal
title: Great look on my motor 360

author: Scott Moyer
comment: I like the concept, but the notifications cover up the time... Sometimes you just want to see the time and not have to deal with the latest notification (or it's a persistent notification and "no time for you" ). Please give me an option to flip the time to the top.
title: Would like to see the time

author: Brandon Owens
comment: By far the best digital watch face I have come across for the Moto 360. 10/10 would buy again.
title: Can't get much better than this!

author: Louie Sanchez III
comment: The creator of awesome he replies back quickly and takes in any ideas so mention some! I got him to change the dim view to permanent so it saves battery
title: Nexus 5

author: Andres Andino Jr.
comment: If I could set it so that it never shows the black and white watchface,  and only ever showed the standard one. That would really be awesome. I never use ambient mode,  and whenever I look at the watch,  it's in black and white for a second before switching over to the main one. Once that is fixed it's a five star watchface!
title: By far my favorite watch face. But...

author: T- Smooth
comment: Magnificent! Can you add seconds to dim mode face as well? I like using the different colored faces for my moto 360.
title: Colors

comment: I love this app! It looks great and I love the information it displays including battery percentage. I also like the ability to change the screen timeout.
